text: cargo runner need transportation device
to transport all your belongings while
running people wasting that time
commuting from A to B and haven't got
enough time to doing the exercise in the
evening so i thought about combining
both together it's something in between
trolley for luggage & braxer you can use
it as a normal rucksack when you don't
run and then you can easily set up by
pulling out the pool and attaching the
wheels takes about half a minute I had
to find the right size of the wheel
which is now 10 inch wheel which
perfectly takes all the small bumps from
the ground and then I have a spring
system and the tube as well which
actually equals all the movement you
have in your body so that the device
follow through very smoothly and with
cargo rana you can take up to 15 kilo
with you without any problem and it
doesn't influence your body movement at
all so it's a very comfortable way of
running
